name: Crowd King
description:
Made as part of 2019-2020 IGAD's Year 2 block D project. Special thanks to our teachers, peers and lecturers that made this game possible. The game should be considered an MVP; so a short but complete game.

CONTENT WARNING

Game contains cartoon mischief and slapstick violence

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM SPECIFICATIONS
  • Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • 8 GB RAM
developers: IGAD Breda University of Applied Science
